## Bio

Jacie McHaney is a fourth-year PhD student at the University of Pittsburgh. She is interested 
in the neural mechanisms of speech processing and the influence of aging, cognition and 
sensory impairments on speech processing. She investigates these processes through a 
combination of behavioral, electrophysiological, neurophysiological and computational 
techniques.
